attributes.action: improve the body that screens TV and Radio Adverts
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some of the current advertisements on TV and Radio (Halifax, Natwest, Go Compare, ...) are testing the patience of normal UK Citizens.  

The ASA needs to oversee an improved standard because it is irritating a large proportion of the nation.  This petition proposes that the Government/Parliament improves the standards required for advertisements
